I am a PhD Candidate in the [Department of Demography](https://hcap.utsa.edu/demography/) at the [University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA)](https://www.utsa.edu/).

I also a Graduate Research Assistant at the [Institute for Demographic and Socioeconomic Research (IDSER)](https://idser.utsa.edu/) at UTSA. 

My research interests are mortality, aging, health disparities, mental health, causal inference.

I earned my MA in Sociology in 2012 from the McMaster University in Hamilton, ON, Canada.
